issue.title: [CF 988] Mangle! doesn't cause icon to show
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Druid Guardian get Mangle to proc as Mangle!

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
When Mangle! procs Icon should show up, but nothing happens

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
7.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no, where are they located?

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SMangle! ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^Sr_anim^F4803839602528529 ^f-55^SType ^SAnimations^Sg_anim ^N1^Sb_anim ^F6004799503160661^f-54 ^SAnimation^SACTVTNGLOW ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^S33917 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N70206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user zardada | Imported from CurseForge issue #988 | Raw

comments.body:
It's not a buff that you actually gain, so you can't track it as a buff. Use a Combat Event icon if you want to see when it procs:

^1^T^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_AURA_APPLIED^B ^t^SType^Scleu ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SName^SMangle! ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^Sr_anim^F4803839602528529 ^f-55^SType ^SAnimations^Sg_anim ^N1^Sb_anim ^F6004799503160661^f-54 ^SAnimation^SACTVTNGLOW ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^S33917 ^SDestUnit^Splayer ^SSourceUnit^Splayer ^SEnabled^B ^SCLEUDur^N3 ^t^N71035^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
